user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios using the NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios using the NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Select the appropriate demand profile generation method based on the user input for the specified TYNDP scenario years and scenario types.

tasks.description: Split the nodes of the generated hourly demand profiles into the required subsets.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Determine which demand profile nodes should be split based on the energy model's configuration and the provided user scenario.

function_args.user_input: Convert the prepared hourly hydrogen demand profiles into TST format.

tasks.description: Convert the prepared hourly hydrogen demand profiles into the TST format.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Ensure that the TST format workbooks are generated correctly from the prepared hourly demand profiles.
